text: Wang Jingxia is a Chinese football player. She was part of the Chinese team at the 1999 FIFA Women's World Cup. ==References== Category:1976 births Category:Living people Category:Chinese women's footballers Category:Chinese footballers Category:Asian Games medalists in football Category:1999 FIFA Women's World Cup players Category:China women's international footballers Category:Women's association football defenders Category:Medalists at the 1990 Asian Games Category:Asian Games gold medalists for China
title: Wang Jingxia
